articles.description: Coach Kyle Shanahan's declaration that Trey Lance is the 49ers' starting quarterback made official what Lance knew and had prepared for this offseason.
articles.content: SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- While San Francisco 49ers coach Kyle Shanahan's definitive declaration that this team now belongs to quarterback Trey Lance might have come as news to outside observers, it was… [+3675 chars]

articles.description: Trump National Golf Club will host the third event on the LIV Golf schedule, with Dustin Johnson and Brooks Koepka headlining the participants.
articles.content:
The LIV Golf Bedminster will take place from July 29-31, with 48 golfers traveling to New Jersey for the controversial tour's third event on the 2022 LIV Golf schedule.

articles.title: Michael Thomas 'kind of lost for words' as he returns to practice field at New Orleans Saints training camp - ESPN
articles.description: Receiver Michael Thomas, who originally injured his left ankle in Week 1 of the 2020 season, was back at Saints practice Wednesday, after multiple surgeries.
